exposurecompensation: -2 EV to +2 EV in increments of 1/3 EV
continuousdrive: Best Shot Selector Continuous H Continuous H 60 Continuous H 120 Continuous L Multi-shot 16 Pre-shooting cache Single
flashcontrol: TTL auto flash with monitor preflashes
flashrange: [W]: 0.5 to 4.0m (1ft. 8in. to 13ft.) [T]: 1.2 to 2.0m (3ft. 8 in. to 6 ft. 6 in.)
focallength: 4.5-54.0mm (angle of view equivalent to that of 25-300 mm lens in 35mm [135] format)
scenemodes: Back Light Beach Black and White Copy Close Up Copy Dusk/Dawn Easy Panorama Fireworks Show Food Landscape Museum Night Landscape Night Portrait Party/Indoor Pet Portrait Portrait Scene Auto Selector Snow Sports Sunset 3D Photography
meteringsystem: Matrix Center-weighted (digital zoom less than 2x) Spot (digital zoom 2X or more)
shutterspeed: 1/2000-1 sec. 4 sec. (when scene mode is set to Fireworks show)
digitalzoom: Up to 4X (angle of view equivalent to that of approx. 1200mm lens in 35mm[135] format)
